com.reply.solidsoft.nbs.integration.connection

Class TokenClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.reply.solidsoft.nbs.integration.connection.TokenClient

  • public class TokenClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Client for OAuth 2.0 token provider using Client Credentials grant.
